com.ibm.jikes.skij
Class InputPort

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.ibm.jikes.skij.InputPort
public class InputPort
extends Object

This implements Scheme input ports by acting as a wrapper around a Java reader.

The implementation of read (Lisp expression reading) has a few problems. In particular, mixed reads and read-chars won't work (chars will get lost in the tokenizer buffer).
